snippet.title: Bonnie Bear Saves Frogtime Trailer
snippet.description:
Our next game is called Bonnie Bear Saves Frogtime. Wishlist here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2466130/Bonnie_Bear_Saves_Frogtime/
made by Bonte Avond, published by offbrand games.

Play as a bear dressed as a frog, collecting frogs in a frog-obsessed world. Meet lots of original all-voice acted characters, play along to tons of indie songs and become the ultimate frogtime player (or don't, it's all good, rlly).

----------------------------------

Bonnie’s self-worth is at an all-time low, and there’s only one thing that can fix it - a lovely game of Frogtime! Grab your toadbag and get ready to go on a hilarious adventure full of quirky characters, explorable islands, and oh so many frogs.

• A froggy-feeling bear: Step into the paws of Bonnie Bear as they bond with friends, rediscover their self-worth, and have a hilarious and heart-felt island adventure.

• It’s time to f-f-f-f-f-f-f-frog!: Win, trade, buy, and collect over x frogs and x frog booster packs to craft your perfect frog deck - then challenge your island neighbors to some Game of Frogs and see who hops out on top.

• Rank up, gear up, and feel good!: Level up to gain new abilities, buy funky frog hats, compete with stronger Game of Frogs players, and raise Bonnie’s self-worth!

• Hand-crafted sounds and tunes: Experience a heartwarming soundtrack and hilarious voice-acting full of improvisations, first-takes, and endearing imperfections.

----------------------------------

Bonte Avond on Twitter: https://x.com/BonteAvond
Bonte Avond on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/t85AhwqWrd
Bonte Avond on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@bonte_avond
offbrand games on Twitter: https://x.com/offbrand_games
